Areas to Support Explore opportunities to support the Stanford community. Diversity, equity, inclusion Support inclusion, equity, and access for all. Athletics Support student-athletes today to create leaders for tomorrow. Planned Giving Achieve your philanthropic and financial goals. Why I give “The world needs creative, cross-functional solutions to the existential challenges we face. Stanford is a special place in a constant state of renewal, and it requires work from alumni to keep it special. I want to play my very small part in that.” Calley Means, ’08 Read the latest stories Gift helps expand, reimagine Native American Studies Stanford's Native American Studies program receives a first-of-its-kind gift from Eric and Wendy Schmidt that will further existing offerings and support new ones VanDerveer honored with named court, coachship A women’s basketball assistant coachship to honor former coach Tara VanDerveer was created by a gift from Tashia and John Morgridge, MBA ’57. Donor-funded curriculum transformation projects gain momentum Six teams across campus aim to ensure that all Stanford students can experience belonging and success.
